sub_rules.content: If there are both static and non-static imports, a single blank line separates the two blocks. There are no other blank lines between import statements.
sub_rules.relationship: 数量限定关系 ∧ 间隔限定关系 ∧ 间隔限定关系
sub_rules.formalization: there must be single_blank_line between static_import_block and non_static_import_block ∧ the quantity of single_blank_line must be equal to 1

sub_rules.content:
Imports are ordered as follows:

All static imports in a single block.
All non-static imports in a single block. Within each block the imported names appear in ASCII sort order. (Note: this is not the same as the import statements being in ASCII sort order, since '.' sorts before ';'.)
